nodes.text: In 30 BBY, Jedi Master Tholme and his Padawan, Aayla Secura, undertook a mission to Ryloth. However, what began as a simple assignment to mediate disputes within the Twi'lek Clan Council erupted into a kidnapping incident, when Nikto Morgukai warriors Tsyr and Bok captured Nat Secura, the heir to Clan Secura.
